review: Easy to set up and operate. Love all of the possibilities with the fire stick. Can't wait to watch all the TED talks!
author: Lil' Delites

review: On the whole we love it! Amazon needs to be more clear that mirroring does not work with Apple products. It says you can mirror from your tablet or smartphone but in reality it is not compatible with Apple products. Bummer!
author: I. Snyder "Truk"

review: Easy to install and now I can watch Netflix and prime on my bedroom TV.
author: Debbie Jones

review: This product works exactly as advertised. Set up was simple and seamless.
author: Jim Wall, D. Min.

review: Great I love the fire stick
author: Tremayne Lipford
